voice.text: Hey, need some furniture for your house? Come to my shop!

parameter.value: I have {beds}, {chairs}, {containers}, {decoration}, {flowers}, {instruments}, {pillows}, {pottery}, {statues}, {tapestries} and {tables}. Which of those would you like to see?
Have a look. Most furniture comes in handy kits. Just use them in your house to assemble the furniture. Do you want to see only a certain {type} of furniture?
Be greeted, visitor. If you're interested in buying furniture, ask me for a trade.
